items.content_html: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
items.title: talentedaamer/javascript-confirm: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
items.title: orchidjs/tom-select: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: `byte-packet` is a lightweight utility module designed for generating, manipulating, and validating byte packets with cryptographic security in Node.js or the browser. It integrates payload generation, checksum calculation, and flexible byte array handling. Emphasis on performance, minimalism, and ease of integration.
items.title: adam-ballinger/byte-packet: `byte-packet` is a lightweight utility module designed for generating, manipulating, and validating byte packets with cryptographic security in Node.js or the browser. It integrates payload generation, checksum calculation, and flexible byte array handling. Emphasis on performance, minimalism, and ease of integration.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether youâ€™re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
